text: Maqbul Ahmed (2 August 1939 â€“ 13 April 2021) was the Ameer, or chief, of Bangladesh Jamaat-e-Islami, the largest Islamic party of Bangladesh. He started his duty emir on 17 October 2016. Before that he worked as acting leader for six years. == Death == Ahmed died on 13 April 2021 at Ibn Sina Medical College Hospital, Dhaka, Bangladesh. ==References== Category:Bangladesh Jamaat-e-Islami politicians Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths
title: Maqbul Ahmed
